Authors:
Jouko Rikkinen, Hanna Susanna Tuovila, Christina Beimforde,
Leyla J. Seyfullah, Vincent Perrichot, Alexander Schmidt
Title:
Chaenothecopsis neocaledonica sp. nov.: The first
resinicolous fungus from an araucarian conifer.
Keywords:
Exudate, Mycocaliciales, resinicolous fungi, Aracariaceae,
New Caledonia
Abstract:
A new resinicolous species of Chaenothecopsis is described
from New Caledonia: Chaenothecopsis neocaledonica from resin of Agathis
ovata (Araucariaceae, Pinales). The new species is the first
mycocalicioid fungus to be described from the exudates of Southern
Hemisphere confers. It is compared with morphologically and ecologically
similar species from the Northern Hemisphere.

trees.title:
Chaenothecopsis neocaledonica sp. nov. ITS1, 5.8SR,
ITS2 and 28S, partial
